author: ranket
title: PAB promotion in Japan
description: Plutus the fundamental program language is not so popular especially in Japan. It is only few method to learn Plutus and hard to develop.
solution: We will provide the guide book (or Website) for Plutus Application Background in Japanese. This will be interested Japanese Engineers.
experience: Members strongly have strongly promoted connection between catalyst project and Japan community through Meet up. Seminars and Lectures.
